ControlledConcept.gml:description: Mapped feature geometry was digitized from a published map, specification of feature based on map unit explanation Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:published_map
ControlledConcept.name: Published map

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Indicates that mapped feature is not directly observable, location and specification based on inference from available evidence. Source: Federal Geographic Data Committee, 2006
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:inferred
ControlledConcept.name: Inferred

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Location and specification inferred based on properties related to lithology, e.g. geophysical or geochemical signature, vegetation, surface texture, reflectance. Source: based on Matti et al 1997; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:inferred_indirect_method
ControlledConcept.name: Inferred-indirect method

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Location and specification inferred based on magnetic field data acquired by airborne sensor. Source: based on Matti et al 1997; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:inferred_aeromagnetic_survey
ControlledConcept.name: Inferred-aeromagnetic survey

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Location and specification inferred based on measured variations in the acceleration of gravity related to mass of underlying Earth material. Source: based on Matti et al 1997; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:inferred_gravity_data
ControlledConcept.name: Inferred-gravity data

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Location and specification inferred based on magnetic field data acquired by sensor on the earth surface, either at manually occupied stations, or by a vehicle-based continuously collected sensor data. Source: based on Matti et al 1997; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:inferred_ground_magnetic_survey
ControlledConcept.name: Inferred-ground magnetic survey

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Location and specification inferred based on flux or intensity of radiation related to the decay of radioactive elements in observed Earth material. Use for both airborne and ground-surface based sensor. Source: based on Matti et al 1997; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:inferred_radiometric_survey
ControlledConcept.name: Inferred-radiometric survey

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Location and specification inferred based on spectral characteristics of light measured by airborne or satellite based sensor. Phenomenon visible on standard (visible light) air photographs are considered 'observable'. Source: based on Matti et al 1997; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:inferred_remote_sensing_imagery
ControlledConcept.name: Inferred-remote sensing imagery

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Location and specification inferred based on measurements made by electronic bore hole logging device(s) that measure geophysical properties. Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:inferred_borehole_geophysical_log
ControlledConcept.name: Inferred-borehole geophysical log

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Geologic feature in bore hole inferred based on interpretation of drill cuttings. Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:inferred_drill_cuttings
ControlledConcept.name: Inferred-drill cuttings

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Location and specification determined based on inferred continuity with observed locations, and assumption of continuity of the feature. Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:inferred_projection__observed_locations
ControlledConcept.name: Inferred-projection- observed locations

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Phenomenon inferred to exist based on continuity with observed locations, and assumption of continuity of the feature. Mappable feature is covered by mapped younger geologic unit. Concealed feature. Source: Federal Geographic Data Committee, 2006
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:inferred_projection_covering_mapped_unit
ControlledConcept.name: Inferred-projection-covering mapped unit

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Location and specification determined based on inferred continuity with observed locations, and assumption of continuity of the feature. Not observable because of covering mantle of soil, talus or colluvium, not mapped as separate geologic units. Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:inferred_projection_unmapped_surficial_material
ControlledConcept.name: Inferred-projection-unmapped surficial material

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Location and specification determined based on inferred continuity with observed locations, and assumption of continuity of the feature. Not observable because of obscuring vegetation, but inferred to crop out at surface. Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:inferred_projection_vegetation
ControlledConcept.name: Inferred-projection-vegetation

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Indicates that mapped feature was delineated and a specifier assigned by direct visual observation. Source: Federal Geographic Data Committee, 2006
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:direct_observation
ControlledConcept.name: Direct observation

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Phenomenon observed and located directly in outcrop; geologist occupied location of phenomenon, and traced it explicitly over mapped extent. Source: based on Matti et al 1997; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:observed_outcrop
ControlledConcept.name: Observed-outcrop

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Phenomenon observed and located from a distance. Source: based on Matti et al 1997; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:observed_distant_outcrop
ControlledConcept.name: Observed-distant outcrop

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Phenomenon observed directly in outcrop, and located by positioning on a topographic base map relative to physiographic or cultural features Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:observed_outcrop__topographic_map_location
ControlledConcept.name: Observed-outcrop- topographic map location

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Phenomenon observed directly in outcrop, and located using GPS Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:observed_outcrop_gps_location
ControlledConcept.name: Observed-outcrop-GPS location

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Geologic feature observed in core obtained from a borehole. Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:observed_borehole_core
ControlledConcept.name: Observed-borehole core

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Phenomenon observed and located using aerial imagery (standard visible light) Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:observed_aerial_imagery
ControlledConcept.name: Observed-aerial imagery

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Geomorphic features located and specified based on surface morphology determined by elevation (or bathemetry) data, e.g. a DEM Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:observed_elevation_data
ControlledConcept.name: Observed-elevation data

ControlledConcept.gml:description: mapped feature is located by survey methods Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:surveyed
ControlledConcept.name: Surveyed

ControlledConcept.gml:description: mapped feature is located by inertial survey methods Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:MappedFeatureObservationMethod:200811:inertial_survey
ControlledConcept.name: Inertial survey
